question: Any one else having cravings yet? All I want to eat is salad!! Lol, guess that's a pretty healthy craving so far, but I also want to drink Orange juice non stop, which I'm sure has some benefits however I do worry about the sugar since diabetes runs strong in my family!! Should I be careful or drink as much as I want?
title: cravings?
